resources.string: Source and/or destination file paths missing!
Could not access input or output file!
Error occurred writing to output file!
Please consider showing ads to support the developer!

How to Encode and Decode
\ OpenIntents FileManager, or any similar file manager is required
\ 1. Press button to right of source text field to select input
\ 2. Press button to right of destination text field to select output
\ 3. Select encode or decode mode using toggle button
\ 4. Select encode/decode options if necessary
\ 5. Press the Encode or Decode button to begin
\ 
\ Problems Encoding or Decoding?
\ 1. Make sure you have sufficient space available on your sdcard
\ 2. Make sure you are attempting to decode/encode a supported file type
\ 3. Try re-installing the application
\ 4. Send me an email with your problems/questions
\ 
\ Supported File Types
\ Encoding: WAVE input only (.wav extension)
\ Decoding: MP3 input only (.mp3 extension)
\
